title: Input box for json.facet in Admin UI
description:
We need an input box for JSON facet. I imagine to add another text-box that appears when you click the "facet" checkbox in the Query tab of the Admin UI. Alternatively it could be a separate checkbox for "JSON facet".

 

The text box should be several lines high to facilitate easy copy/paste of JSON.

comments.content: Yonik Seeley I could not find an existing issue for this. You may have some thoughts already on this. It would be sweet to have a whole separate JSON QUERY tab in the left hand menu that allows you to freely express JSON QUERY & FACET in a huge text box, with context-sensitive help and all. Or there could be two tabs in the existing Query tab to switch between legacy and JSON QUERY style input?
comments.author: Jan Høydahl

comments.content: Anyone have thoughs on this? Just start with a simple texarea input box?
comments.author: Jan Høydahl

comments.content: A simple text area, with a link to some decent documentation?
comments.author: Upayavira
